dcterms:creator: A. Graves
G. Wayne
I. Danihelka
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate the performance of models on the task of finding the shortest path in a graph, where the model receives a description of the graph as its set of edges and a query for the source and target nodes.
dcterms:title: Graph Shortest Path

dcterms:creator: A. Graves
G. Wayne
I. Danihelka
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate the performance of models on the task of finding the convex hull of a set of 2D points, where the model's goal is to identify the smallest convex polygon containing all the points.
dcterms:title: Convex Hull

dcterms:creator: A. Graves
G. Wayne
I. Danihelka
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate the performance of models on the task of finding the minimum cut in a connected graph, where the model receives a description of the graph as its set of edges.
dcterms:title: Graph MinCut

dcterms:creator: A. Graves
G. Wayne
I. Danihelka
dcterms:description: A dataset used to evaluate the performance of models on the task of associative recall, where the model receives a list of items and must output the subsequent item in response to a query.
dcterms:title: Associative Recall
